src.view

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.view.Connection

  • public abstract class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    The connection class will start a thread; the thread is used to make network connection between the server and client. This class will also use a buffer as a means for the client and server to communicate
    Author:
    thanvas
